topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d52171636872019e310200#post_53d52171636872019e310200
I'm almost terrified to ask, but what is their reasoning for pursuing impeachment?

"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d5259a6368727c4abb0000#post_53d5259a6368727c4abb0000
I don't know about him doing things that actually *WORK*, the economy is still in the shitter, the war in Afghanistan is still on going, drone strikes have arguably made him a more hated president than Bush in that region of the world, and Obama care is exactly the glorious salvation of working class that it was promised to be.

I'm not saying impeachment is justified (because frankly no President does things that work because the office does not actually have that much power), just that he isn't exactly the second coming of Christ either.

The birther bullshit though is definitely racist.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d5283e63687254ccdb0000#post_53d5283e63687254ccdb0000

Sure, you're not wrong, but at least the things President Obama's done have helped roll the economy back in the right direction, even if we still gotta help the middle class. He's not necessarily perfect, but that's fine, since he accepts he's human.


In another way to kill time;


_All that is near us, we must know can disappear any day, be careful
The main key to finding happiness lies nowhere else but in my soul
You could reminisce, you could recall, the very last time you felt joy
Or maybe you are so blessed to a point, that you can't remember anything
It's a harmony, a miracle, being able to breathe and live at all
So here is your one and only chance, life is an opportunity!

All that is near us, we must know can disappear any day, be careful
The main key to finding happiness lies nowhere else but in my soul
You know the closer you get to something, the tougher it is to see it
And I'll never take it for granted!

Everybody tells you from time to time, to never give up like the phrase from a movie...
They tell you to stand up for yourself, as if it was always that easy!
Gather a handful of courage in my heart to go on and survive another day
And I'll never take it for granted!
*Let's go!*_

~ Joe Inoue, Closer, Naruto Shippuden opening 4
topics.author: 5056c9e87f123b37f6012a34

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d5283e63687254ccdb0000#post_53d5283e63687254ccdb0000
[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d52171636872019e310200#post_53d52171636872019e310200
I'm almost terrified to ask, but what is their reasoning for pursuing impeachment?
[/bq]
The affordable care act.

As for if Obama is a good or bad president I would rate him as average.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d52b4a6368725eb0200000#post_53d52b4a6368725eb0200000
Dear. Fucking. God.

Just... just get over it you fucks. You know how a smart political party would handle things? Well since there is an election coming up they'd just run on the platform of repealing said act if its really that unpopular.

Or hell, maybe do something really crazy and I don't know... adapt to the changing political landscape! How about acknowledging that the reason for the affordable health care act is because the current system has failed spectacularly and a combination of crony capitalism and government bureaucracy are antithetical to correcting the problem!

Goddamn this next election is going to hurt.

On a lighter note, I think it would be hilarious if after he left office Obama announced that he was secretly Muslim the whole time.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

I swear I'm just going to make every debate into a drinking game. The sort where I drink while the rage builds inside of me.

Yes, even though I vote for neither one of the political parties that always win, I do watch the debates. No I don't know why.

topics.body:
You know what sucks in a video game?  When your teammates think they're leeroy jenkins.

I've been playing league of legends and that's the number one mistake of rookies is going "LEERROOYYYYY JEENNNNKIINNNSSSS!" and running face first into a turret.  I'm pretty sure most video games a machine gun facial is not pretty.
